      • loadClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String classToLoad)
        Parameters:
        classToLoad - The desired class to load
        Returns:
        The loaded class returned by classLoader.loadClass or null if there was an error

      • loadAndInstantiateClass

        public static java.lang.Object loadAndInstantiateClass(java.lang.String classToLoad,
                                       java.lang.Object[] constructorArgs,
                                       java.lang.Class<?>... constructorArgTypes)
        This method is to load and instantiate classes with constructors
        Parameters:
        classToLoad - The class to load
        constructorArgs - The arguments for the class constructor
        constructorArgTypes - The argument types for the class constructor
        Returns:
        A new instance of the class or null if there was an error

        This method is to load and instantiate class without constructors
        Parameters:
        classToLoad - The class to load
        Returns:
        A new instance of the class or null if there was an error
